title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 205.14 - Time limitations for proceedings involving custody or visitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 205.14 - Time limitations for proceedings involving custody or visitation

State Regulations

In any proceeding brought pursuant to section
467, 651
or
652
of the

Family Court Act to determine temporary or permanent custody or visitation, once a hearing or trial is commenced, it shall proceed to conclusion within 90
days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
205.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
